basic.description:
{Basic Artillery}

Gives control of the ballista, allowing one shot with a 50% chance to inflict double damage and increases 100% damage.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Artillery}

Gives control of the ballista, allowing two shots with a 75% chance to inflict double damage and increases 200% damage.

expert.description:
{Expert Artillery}

Gives control of the ballista, allowing two shots which inflict double damage and increases 300% damage.
